enemies_65000000_bc.name: Amphibite
enemies_65000000_bc.notes_and_attacks: Always appears with a Croaker and a Rain Frog, Physical/Magic damage to 1 ally, Physical/Magic damage to 1 ally

enemies_65000000_bc.name: Anion
enemies_65000000_bc.notes_and_attacks: Physical/Magic damage to 1 character, Magic/Physical damage to 1 character (much more dangerous than other attack)

enemies_65000000_bc.name: Avian Rex
enemies_65000000_bc.notes_and_attacks: Physical/Magic damage to 1 character

enemies_65000000_bc.name: Azala
enemies_65000000_bc.notes_and_attacks: Physical damage to 1 character, Puts 1 character to sleep, Physical damage to 1 character, Physical damage and causes HP to steadily decrease to all characters right before dying

enemies_65000000_bc.name: BlackTyrano
enemies_65000000_bc.notes_and_attacks: Defense and Magic Defense go down while counting from 5 to 0, Fire damage to 1 character, Absorbs 1 character's HP, Fire damage to all characters after counting down from 5, Causes HP of all characters to steadily decrease after each count from 5 to 0

enemies_65000000_bc.name: Cave Ape
enemies_65000000_bc.notes_and_attacks: Physical/Magic damage to 1 character, Counterattacks with Physical damage to 1 character only if near a Reptite, Shist or Pahoehoe, Counterattacks against Magic (if not near a Reptite, Shist or Pahoehoe) with Physical damage to 1 character

enemies_65000000_bc.name: Croaker
enemies_65000000_bc.notes_and_attacks: Appears with an Amphibite and Rain Frog, Physical/Magic damage to 1 character, Physical/Magic damage to 1 character

enemies_65000000_bc.name: Evilweevil
enemies_65000000_bc.notes_and_attacks: If left alone (outside of battle) they'll sometimes burrow holes and open up new areas, Physical/Magic damage to 1 character, Counterattacks by absorbing a Fly Trap's HP (if one is available) if HP drops below half

enemies_65000000_bc.name: Fly Trap
enemies_65000000_bc.notes_and_attacks: Counterattacks by poisoning 1 character

enemies_65000000_bc.name: Gold Eaglet
enemies_65000000_bc.notes_and_attacks: Becomes Red Eaglet after being hit twice, Physical/Magic damage to 1 ally, Physical/Magic damage to 1 ally (VERY rarely, and usually misses)

enemies_65000000_bc.name: Ion
enemies_65000000_bc.notes_and_attacks: Magic/Physical damage to 1 character, Physical/Magic damage to 1 character (much more dangerous than other attack)

enemies_65000000_bc.name: Kilwala
enemies_65000000_bc.notes_and_attacks: Physical/Magic damage to 1 character

enemies_65000000_bc.name: Megasaur
enemies_65000000_bc.notes_and_attacks: Physical/Magic damage to 1 character, Fire damage to 1 character, Lightning temporarily stuns it and greatly lowers physical defense

enemies_65000000_bc.name: Nizbel
enemies_65000000_bc.notes_and_attacks: Defense goes way down temporarily after being hit by lightning, Physical/Magic damage to 1 character, Physical damage to all characters, Lightning damage to all characters only after being hit by lightning

enemies_65000000_bc.name: Nizbel II
enemies_65000000_bc.notes_and_attacks: Lightning attacks make his Physical defense go down, All other attacks make his Physical defense go up, Physical/Magic attack to 1 character, Physical/Magic damage and stop to 1 character, Physical attack to all characters, Physical attack to all characters, Counterattacks against every 3rd Lightning hit with Lightning damage to all characters

enemies_65000000_bc.name: Nu
enemies_65000000_bc.notes_and_attacks: Appears only when raining, Gives you 3 Petals, Fangs, Horns and Petals for beating it and a "Third Eye" after beating it for the first time, Reduces 1 character's HP to 1

enemies_65000000_bc.name: Pahoehoe
enemies_65000000_bc.notes_and_attacks: Fire damage (Physical, not Magic) to 1 character

enemies_65000000_bc.name: Rain Frog
enemies_65000000_bc.notes_and_attacks: Always appears with an Amphibite and a Croaker, Magic/Physical damage to 1 ally, Physical/Magic damage to 1 ally

enemies_65000000_bc.name: Red Eaglet
enemies_65000000_bc.notes_and_attacks: Physical/Magic damage to 1, Counterattacks with Fire damage to 1, Physical/Magic damage to 1 character (VERY rarely and usually misses)

enemies_65000000_bc.name: Reptite (1)
enemies_65000000_bc.notes_and_attacks: Physical/Magic damage to 1 character, Magic damage and Sleep to 1 character

enemies_65000000_bc.name: Reptite (2)
enemies_65000000_bc.notes_and_attacks: Defense down and temporarily disabled when struck by lightning, Physical/Magic damage to 1 character, Damages Volcano (if available) which causes Fire (physical, not magic) damage to all characters

enemies_65000000_bc.name: Runner
enemies_65000000_bc.notes_and_attacks: Physical/Magic damage to 1 character, Defense down and temporarily disabled when struck by lightning

enemies_65000000_bc.name: Shist
enemies_65000000_bc.notes_and_attacks: Turns into Pahoehoe if hit

enemies_65000000_bc.name: Shitake
enemies_65000000_bc.notes_and_attacks: Absorbs 1 character's MP only when with a Winged Ape, Runs away only when not with a Winged Ape

enemies_65000000_bc.name: Terrasaur
enemies_65000000_bc.notes_and_attacks: Defense down and temporarily disabled when struck by lightning, Fire damage to 1 character, Reduces 1 character's HP to 1

enemies_65000000_bc.name: Volcano
enemies_65000000_bc.notes_and_attacks: Fire damage (Physical, not Magic) to 1 character, counterattacks by damaging itself and its comrades

enemies_65000000_bc.name: Winged Ape
enemies_65000000_bc.notes_and_attacks: Moves and physically damages 1 character, Moves and physically damages another character, Counterattacks by physically damaging 1 character only if Shitake is present
